td.content: s:a 59 YO white female karate instructor presents with 2 weeks history of moderate belief that patient is infested with parasites that were injected by coworker because of jealousy. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 170 cm, Weight 46.9 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg /day, and ordered Urine toxicology.

denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes

Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 170 cm, Weight 47.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
